00019 #ifndef POLYNOMIAL_REGRESSION_HPP_cm130510_
00020 #define POLYNOMIAL_REGRESSION_HPP_cm130510_
00021 
00022 
00023 #include "carrier_monitoring/polynomial_interval_fit.hpp"
00024 
00025 class polynomial_regression : public polynomial_interval_fit {
00026 public:
00027    polynomial_regression(const std::vector<double>& v,
00028                          unsigned poly_degree)
00029      : polynomial_interval_fit(poly_degree, make_single_interval(v)) {
00030      ASSERT_THROW(fit(v) == true);
00031    }
00032 
00033   virtual ~polynomial_regression() {}
00034 
00035 private:
00036   static const index_vector_type& make_single_interval(const std::vector<double>& v) {
00037     ASSERT_THROW(not v.empty());
00038     static index_vector_type iv(2);
00039     iv[0] = 0;
00040     iv[1] = v.size()-1;
00041     return iv;
00042   }
00043 } ;
00044 
00045 #endif // POLYNOMIAL_REGRESSION_HPP_cm130510_
